statements: DELETE FROM customer_purchase_data WHERE product_category = 'Electronics' AND purchase_date <= '2022-01-01'
DELETE FROM customer_purchase_data WHERE customer_id = 1001 AND product_category = 'Electronics';
DELETE FROM customer_purchase_data WHERE purchase_date >= '2022-01-01' AND total_purchase_amount > 1000.00;
DELETE FROM customer_purchase_history WHERE customer_id = 100 AND purchase_date > '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM predicted_buying_behavior WHERE predicted_purchase_date < '2023-06-15' AND customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM customer_purchase_history WHERE purchase_amount > 1000);
DELETE FROM orders WHERE customer_id = 2 AND product_id = 3;
